message.body: Hey. You don't happen to be off today, are you?

Cause I COMPLETELY forgot that I needed to get the clicker from you. I walked into class and I was like "oh damn!" I didn't need it though thank god. Just wanted to see if I could swing by, but that's okay.
Okay! And what time will you get home tomorrow? Maybe I can pick it up since it won't be raining.
I get home close to eight. But you can stop by earlier and my mom can give it to you. She should be home by our before four.
Oh okay!!! Then I will go to your house after I get off the train tomorrow. Should be between 5-6 (my guess).
Ok. I'll let my mom know.
